description:
The new club members riff on what a "new gymnastics club" might be like and then the original members re-introduce the Tesaguri Club by launching into highlight clips, but done with musical numbers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with the Gymnastics Club and Musicals
Taisou Bu to Musical de Asobou
体操部とミュージカルで遊ぼう
